contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "that God did not make the law for the righteous man" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: that law is not made for a righteous man

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "God made the law" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: It is made

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "which God has given me and made me responsible for" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: with which I have been entrusted

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "God showed me mercy" or "I obtained mercy from God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: I was given mercy

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "in agreement with what other believers prophesied about you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.quote: κατὰ τὰς προαγούσας ἐπὶ σὲ προφητείας
contextId.glQuote: in accordance with the prophecies previously made about you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "that God may teach them" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: they may be taught

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "I urge all believers to make requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgiving to God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.quote: παρακαλῶ ... ποιεῖσθαι δεήσεις, προσευχάς, ἐντεύξεις, εὐχαριστίας
contextId.glQuote: I urge that requests, prayers, intercessions, and thanksgivings be made

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "God desires to save all people and for them to come to the knowledge of the truth" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.quote: ὃς πάντας ἀνθρώπους θέλει σωθῆναι, καὶ εἰς ἐπίγνωσιν ἀληθείας ἐλθεῖν
contextId.glQuote: He desires all people to be saved and to come to the knowledge of the truth

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Christ made me, Paul, a preacher and an apostle" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: I myself, was made a herald and an apostle

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Adam is the one God formed first" or "God created Adam first" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Adam was formed first

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "And Adam was not the one whom the serpent deceived" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Adam was not deceived

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "but it was the woman who disobeyed God when the serpent deceived her" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.quote: ἡ δὲ γυνὴ ἐξαπατηθεῖσα, ἐν παραβάσει γέγονεν
contextId.glQuote: but the woman was deceived and became a transgressor

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "God will save her" or "God will save women" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: she will be saved

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the truth that God revealed" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: the revealed truth

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "Other believers should approve of them first" or "They should prove themselves first" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: They should also be approved first

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the Holy Spirit confirmed that he was who he said he was" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: was vindicated by the Spirit

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "the angels saw him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: was seen by angels

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "people in many nations told others about him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: was proclaimed among nations

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "people in many parts of the world believed in him" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: was believed on in the world

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "God the Father took him up to heaven in glory" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: was taken up in glory

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "everything that God has created is good" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: everything created by God is good

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "We should not refuse anything for which we give thanks to God" or "Everything that we eat with thanksgiving is acceptable" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Nothing that we take with thanksgiving is to be rejected

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "we sanctify it" or "we have set it apart" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: it is sanctified

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in positive form. Alternate translation: "Be sure to use" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Do not neglect

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "which you received when leaders of the church spoke God's word" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: which was given to you through prophecy

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "People must be able to attest to her good deeds" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: She must be known for good deeds

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "All believers should think of the elders who are good leaders as worthy" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: Let the elders who rule well be considered worthy

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "The sins of some people are very obvious" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.quote: τινῶν ἀνθρώπων αἱ ἁμαρτίαι πρόδηλοί εἰσιν
contextId.glQuote: The sins of some people are openly known

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active and positive form. Alternate translation: "the unbelievers might always speak respectfully about the name of God and the teaching" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]] and [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.quote: μὴ τὸ ὄνομα τοῦ Θεοῦ καὶ ἡ διδασκαλία βλασφημῆται
contextId.glQuote: the name of God and the teaching might not be blasphemed

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "For the masters whom the slaves help with their work" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: For the masters who are helped by their work

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Possible meanings are 1) "and the slaves should love them" or 2) "whom God loves" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: and are loved

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "to which God has called you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: to which you were called

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "faithfully proclaim the true message that Jesus has given to you" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: protect what was given to you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be stated in active form. Alternate translation: "of what some people falsely call knowledge" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-activepassive]])
contextId.glQuote: of what is falsely called knowledge
